traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, Ontharyx has disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The mutate makes two Unarmed Strike or Nightmare Blast attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6 damage) psychic damage.

actions.name: Nightmare Blast
entries: Ranged atk +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 7 (2d6 damage) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or have the {@condition frightened} condition until the start of Ontharyx's next turn.
